subject: Skiing
lead_paragraph: Bulgaria’s ski team received a big boost in December when the nation fast-tracked a passport into the hands of the 33-year-old slalom skier Kilian Albrecht, who had been dropped from the Austrian ski team.
snippet: Bulgaria’s ski team received a big boost in December when the nation fast-tracked a passport into the hands of the 33-year-old slalom skier Kilian Albrecht, who had been dropped from the Austrian ski team.
